price: 138. Voilà un manifeste pour les hommes, un guide droit (hudâ), et une leçon pour les gens pieux.
arabic: هَٰذَا بَيَانٞ لِّلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَمَوۡعِظَةٞ لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: hādhā bayānun lilnnāsi wahudan wamawʿiẓatun lil'muttaqīna
